import emailjs from 'emailjs-com' import { useState } from 'react' import './EmailSend.css' function EmailSend() { const [mensajeEnviado, setMensajeEnviado] = useState(false); const [form, setForm] = useState(false); const [value, setValue] = useState("") const [error, setError] = useState("") function handleSubmit(e) { e.preventDefault() if(value.trim() === ""){ console.error('faltan campos') } emailjs.sendForm('service_k7khs1e', 'template_x6k8b7e', e.target, 'luKgETKyzUKU2Ynic') .then((result) => { if(result.ok){ console.log() }else{ } }) setValue("") setMensajeEnviado(true) setForm(true) } function handleChange(e){ setValue(e.target.value) } return (
